nodes.text: Les Madrin was a Rattataki male who Akaavi Spar and Mako were contracted to kill. During a confrontation on Tatooine, the bounty hunting duo cornered Les Madrin in a room and killed him. Mako justified his death by recalling that she only took contracts against 'bad guys'.

Les Madrin first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne if the Alliance Commander is a bounty hunter or a smuggler, who witnesses his death before having the opportunity to recruit Spar and Mako.
